page.title: 02HOME LIFE IN LIDLINGTON
page.content: THERE IS A WIDE VARIETY OF HOUSING WITHIN THE VILLAGE CATERING FROM OLD AGE PENSIONERS BUNGALOWS TO LARGE DETACHED HOUSES,SO THE HOME LIFE VARIES A GREAT DEAL. MANY HOMES HAVE CHILDREN SO FAMILY LIFE ACTIVITIES ARE GEARED TOWARDS THE CHILDREN.MOST CHILDREN ENJOY WATCHING T.V. AND MANY HOMES NOW HAVE VIDEOS,SO WATCHING TAPES IS ANOTHER FAVOURITE PASTIME. BARBECUES ARE BECOMING MORE POPULAR AS AN ALTERNATIVE WAY OF HAVING A MEAL AT HOME.ALSO POPULAR IS TAKING THE CHILDREN OUT FOR MEALS AT PLACES LIKE MACDONALDS.MANY FAMILIES HAVE SOME KIND OF PET,E.G.DOG,CAT, RABBITS, HAMSTERS.WEEKENDS ARE USUALLY THE TIME FAMILIES EITHER RELAX TOGETHER OR ALL PARTICIPATE IN SOME FORM OF LEISURE,E.G.SWIMMING,WALKING, VISITING PLACES OF INTEREST.
